title: "Island Getaways"
content:
# Island Getaways

Welcome to Island Getaways, your ultimate destination for tropical vacations! Our website is dedicated to providing you with the best travel experiences possible. 

We offer a wide range of vacation packages to various exotic locations around the world, including the Caribbean, Hawaii, and Southeast Asia. Whether you're looking for a romantic getaway or a family-friendly adventure, we have something for everyone.

Our team of experienced travel experts will help you plan your dream vacation from start to finish. We'll take care of all the details, from flights and accommodations to activities and excursions. All you have to do is sit back, relax, and enjoy the sun, sand, and sea.

So why wait? Start planning your next island getaway today and let us help you create memories that will last a lifetime.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A colorful graphic of a beach party with palm trees and cocktails for a vacation or travel website"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
